name: VN Character Creator app
description:
Character generator app for pc.  
Female and male body. With 5 body colors, hair and expression variations. Perfect for visual novels, dating sims, etc. There is a free demo with a watermark for you to test! :)

You don´t need any Photoshop or gimp knowledge, just open the exe and customize your character.

Just customize your character, export and its a game ready png with transparency.

*You can use it for commercial projects. Please share me in the comments or with an email toshowcase.

Clothes: 

  • School uniform
  • Kimono
  • Mecha suit
  • Tuxedo
  • Casual
  • Sportwear
  • Sport uniform
  • Many more.

Hundreds of combinations, and future updates! 

Please leave in the comments what kind of haircuts, or poses you want for the 1.2 version!
